source.description: Path to source image to use for asset curation

background.description: Page background to use when image source is provided: css value  [default: transparent]

opaque.description: Shows white as canvas background and generates images without transparency  [default: true]

padding.description: Padding to use when image source provided: css value  [default: "10%"]

scrape.description: Scraping Apple Human Interface guidelines to fetch splash screen specs  [default: true]

manifest.description: Web app manifest file path to automatically update manifest file with the generated icons

index.description: Index HTML file path to automatically put splash screen and icon meta tags in

path.description: Path prefix to prepend for href links generated for meta tags

pathOverride.description: Override the path of images used in href/src tags of manifest and HTML files

type.description: Image type: png|jpg  [default: jpg - with the exception of manifest files]

favicon.description: Generate favicon image and HTML meta tag  [default: false]

mstile.description: Generate Windows static tile icons and HTML meta tags  [default: false]

maskable.description: Declare icons in manifest file as maskable icons  [default: true]

landscapeOnly.description: Only generate landscape splash screens  [default: false]

portraitOnly.description: Only generate portrait splash screens  [default: false]

darkMode.description: Generate iOS splash screen meta with (prefers-color-scheme: dark) media attr  [default: false]

singleQuotes.description: Generate HTML meta tags with single quotes  [default: false]

xhtml.description: Generate HTML meta tags by self-closing the tags  [default: false]

log.description: Logs the steps of the library process  [default: true]

noSandbox.description: Disable sandbox on bundled Chromium on Linux platforms - not recommended  [default: false]
